text: Warren Kenneth Lees MBE (born 19 March 1952 in Dunedin) is a former New Zealand cricketer and coach. He played 21 tests and 31 one-day internationals from 1976 to 1983 and played for Otago in the Plunket Shield. Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Dunedin
title: Warren Lees
